name: NvestlyCryptoCurrency
0:
”Alexa, ask Nvestly Currency what is the price of bitcoin”
”Alexa, ask Nvestly Currency how much is ethereum”
”Alexa, open Nvestly Currency”

des: Ask Alexa what the current value of your favorite digital currency. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin
